price: Na watasema: Tunaiamini! Lakini wataipata wapi kutoka huko mahala mbali?
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلتَّنَاوُشُ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ
footnotes: Na watasema, watapo iona adhabu: Tunaiamini Haki! Na vipi wao waipate Imani kwa wepesi huo kutoka pahala mbali na dunia ambayo wakati wake umekwisha pita?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqālū āmannā bihi wa-annā lahumu al-tanāwushu min makānin baʿīdin
